description:
My place is great for solo adventurers and families (with kids).

To kitchen, bedroom, dressing table with draws, bathroom ( which is shared with my 2 kids and myself who stay in a different apt) , living room , smart tv's, wifi.

Trains, buses, grocery stores, corner stores, laundry may all less than 5-10 minutes away

A and C train less than 10 mins walking distance

I provide free bottle water
Sofa turns into a bed
name: Affordable 1 bedroom apt, in great neighborhood
review: Nayamkah was very nice and quite helpful, however the apartment was untidy and not clean. It was also advertised as an entire apartment but it was not exactly the situation as the living space and bathroom was shared.
